title: More power from the atom
creator_credit: Frank Green, United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority and Ace Films
brief_description: A resume of the steps which have been taken to implement Britain’s extensive atomic power-station program. Explains what the stations involve in terms of nuclear power production developments, and shows the building of the new reactors in progress and the installation of their various equipment.
